short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you automatically load the New Jersey eCourts cases you care about.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily save and load your New Jersey eCourts cases.

Just pin this add-on to your Toolbar (click the puzzle piece icon, then the push-pin button next to this extension), then click the New Jersey icon and add the information for your cases.

Once you enter a case's information, it can easily be accessed by clicking the relevant button. Once you have logged in, case navigation can be handled using this extension. Currently support is limited to civil law, general equity, and special civil divisions; leave a review if you would like to see support for criminal, tax, or family part cases.

This add-on has been developed by a member of the New Jersey bar.  It does not save your eCourts account information, nor does it transmit any data beyond entering case information into the eCourts search page.
